elements:
I am alive again. I know not how, and I know not why.
Yet here I am.

I am alive again. I know not how, and I know not why.
I am getting used to it.
I am alive again. It is rather pleasant. I hardly even remember being dead.
Stories of Spectres and Other Supernaturals

A hefty tome supposedly filled to the brim with real tales of real hauntings.
I doubt its authenticity on that point, but I may still get something from it.
Left by the young man from the Pet Society. Perhaps I could read it under some better lighting.
